Title: Male Hunt
Writer: France Roche (scenario), Yvon Guézel (idea), Albert Simonin (Julien's adventure), Michel Duran (Fernand's adventure), Michel Audiard (dialogue)
Actors: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean-Claude Brialy, Françoise Dorléac, Marie Laforêt
Plot: Antoine is about to get married to Gisèle. His friend Julien, a confirmed bachelor, tries desperately to talk him out of it, citing his own painful experiences.
